data.what_is: Experiture is a marketing platform that allows users to easily create, deploy, automate, measure and optimize multichannel marketing programs.
data.product_description: Experiture is a marketing platform that allows users to easily create, deploy, automate, measure and optimize multichannel marketing programs.

alternatives.name: Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform

initial_reviews.review_title: Experiture Marketing Platform - A complete solution for all your needs!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Experiture Marketing Platform excels in almost all aspects - at least for our department. This is a complete CRM solution that helps in managing the work with utmost ease, creating a workflow that is suitable for everyone, managing all socials, emails, web and whatnot. We are highly satisfied customers of this platform. The onboarding process was way too overwhelming! This is a crucial step when you become affiliated with a company or their products and the onboarding process should be as smooth as possible, so, if you are planning and preparing to be a part of this platform be ready in advance of a rollercoaster ride!

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Experiture is a platform that is loved by everyone at our department and especially in our office. There is not a single thing that annoys us, and we are all highly satisfied with its overall performance and results at our company.

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Experiture is known to be great when it comes to lead scoring, management as well as creation of campaigns, and market automations of all genres and for all size and types of companies. Its cloud based system helps in the easy access of this platform, and you can work on-the-go as well with its mobile applications. As this is a market competitive CRM and market automation solution for you - that too which is the best one. If we look at all these aspects, I think its pricing plans are quite justified and we highly recommend it to businesses who are in dire need of a system to manage all bits and chunks with professionalism.

We are highly satisfied customers of this platform. The onboarding process was way too overwhelming! initial_reviews.review_title: Good platform for marketing of product as well as engagement with customers
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Easy to use and easy of implementation. Customer support is also good. We used this platform for our marketing activity a lot.

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Pricing can be improve. Otherthings i would recommand they can improve in there UI design a bit.

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Best tool for doing marketing activity. Its easy to setup. We achived our goal by setting up Marketing Automation Chapionship for our Education program. It allowed us to engage with our customer easily.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very effective, high-service digital marketing platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
I have had a very good experience with this platform. It provides me and my fellow marketing team members with a very powerful and productive platform to conduct our marketing activities using modern digital marketing techniques to ensure better marketing results and effectiveness.

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Experiture Marketing Platform is able to meet my needs by providing high-quality service, so I have no problem.

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
A single platform that offers a variety of marketing tools. From website building to social media management and SEO, the software has something for everyone. Its reporting and analysis functions provide valuable information for decision-making.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: I have had a very good experience with this platform. It provides me and my fellow marketing team members with a very powerful and productive platform to conduct our marketing activities using modern digital marketing techniques to ensure better marketing results and effectiveness.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: Experiture Marketing Platform is able to meet my needs by providing high-quality service, so I have no problem.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: A single platform that offers a variety of marketing tools. From website building to social media management and SEO, the software has something for everyone. Its reporting and analysis functions provide valuable information for decision-making.

initial_reviews.review_title: Experiture - Premium Marketing Tool for Experts!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
With the use of the amazing and flawless email marketing tool, you can get to deploy, automate, alternate, or implement the best marketing plans. Many users love the strategy with which this software works. Additionally, the software optimized the working and makes the reach quick for you.

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
The only bad thing about this marketing tool here is the unavailability of the best features in the free version and even in the premium version, you don't exactly get what you want. Moreover, the tool never opts for those customers who need to alter the specified console of the system.

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
You will find this one extremely useful as this software contains several complex features and tactics which can enhance the marketing of products. Thus, if you want to be updated with the evolving ecosystem then, you should set up the new version of Experiture which contains the intellectual interface. Every newbie and the expert market strategist should try this one out. It has multiple perks and the best part is that you can go with the workflow using this epic software.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Experiture uniquely positions itself within this evolving eco-system.  Experiture has the sophisticated marketing capabilities and horse power that Marketo/HubSpot offers, which a marketing manager expects, but it also has an intuitive user interface that is simple enough for a salesperson to use to generate targeted, more limited and individualized campaigns.

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Very little at this time.  We are new adopters and very happy with the experience to date.

Recommendations to others considering Experiture Marketing Platform:
Have your entire user group look at the demo.

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Easy to design and deploy email campaigns and landing page design.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: Experiture uniquely positions itself within this evolving eco-system.  Experiture has the sophisticated marketing capabilities and horse power that Marketo/HubSpot offers, which a marketing manager expects, but it also has an intuitive user interface that is simple enough for a salesperson to use to generate targeted, more limited and individualized campaigns.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: Very little at this time.  We are new adopters and very happy with the experience to date.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Experiture Marketing Platform:
review_question_answers.answer: Have your entire user group look at the demo.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Easy to design and deploy email campaigns and landing page design.

initial_reviews.review_title: Experiture is a great tool for our company
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Experiture provides us with everything we ask for. They are always looking to help us get our campaigns live and offer excellent support. Their team will answer any questions we have, even if it is not regarding the Experiture Platform. They are a great source of knowledge and skills that can benefit almost any company.

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
There is not a lot that we dislike about Experiture.

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Experiture Marketing Platform is used by our marketing department. We use The Platform to send out targeted email blasts and direct mail that include Personalized URLS. The Experiture Marketing Platform also helps us capture and segment data from our Ecommerce platform to target the right audience. The team at Experiture addressed problems in our business by helping us gain access to data on our website that we could not access before.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: Experiture provides us with everything we ask for. They are always looking to help us get our campaigns live and offer excellent support. Their team will answer any questions we have, even if it is not regarding the Experiture Platform. They are a great source of knowledge and skills that can benefit almost any company.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: There is not a lot that we dislike about Experiture.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The Experiture Marketing Platform is used by our marketing department. We use The Platform to send out targeted email blasts and direct mail that include Personalized URLS. The Experiture Marketing Platform also helps us capture and segment data from our Ecommerce platform to target the right audience. The team at Experiture addressed problems in our business by helping us gain access to data on our website that we could not access before.

initial_reviews.review_title: 7-Step Multichannel Marketing made easy with Experiture!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
We created a fully customized 7-step Custom Acquisition Program and Experiture was there side-by-side with us to integrate their e mail marketing platform seamlessly  with the tools and functionally Program required.  The platform is intuitive, the ability to make a complex process easy and the team at Experiture is always there to share creative ideas, engage us and our clients to deliver the best possible solutions.

They are an important part of our business as a Strategic Alliance and all of us at The GPS Group are proud to work with their amazing team and highly recommend them!

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Our biggest challenge was not fully understanding the complexity of "effective" multichannel marketing.  Understand the effectiveness of our Proprietary 7-Step Customer Acquisition Program was easy, knowing how to communicate that with any company that offers e mail marketing was our challenge.  After several meetings, we found the process to be overwhelming, complicated (of course we made it complicated) and realized we had a lot of work to do on our end.

Over time, we began to understand the Experiture Platform and got a clear understanding of how we needed to take advantage of their platform and how powerful their Platform could be in helping us achieve the effectiveness and results we were expecting.

Bottom line, any e mail marketing platform is complex and challenging for most people to fully understand and appreciate, but more importantly, finding the people behind the platform is, I believe, the most important factor when reviewing and making a decision on automated e mail marketing programs.

Recommendations to others considering Experiture Marketing Platform:
If you are considering a firm for your e mail marketing and going thru evaluating a company's platform, I would suggest the people behind the platform for their knowledge and experience.  If you have a complex multichannel marketing program, finding people who work with you to achieve your objectives is critical...

In our opinion, The Experiture Team is our Partner and people you should consider for your next campaign!

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had a client that was in multiple vertical markets, needed to get deeper penetration.  The challenge was they needed to reach high-level decision makers responsible for huge budgets.  Reaching these folks was our challenge.  Creating a customized 7-step customer acquisition, utilizing the Experiture Platform allowed us to reach these decision-makers in a way whereby they wanted to talk to our client.  The result, 350 select prospect names, 42 face-to-face meetings and written proposals ranging from $21,000 - $390,000...   Needless to say, our client was thrilled!

review_question_answers.answer:
We created a fully customized 7-step Custom Acquisition Program and Experiture was there side-by-side with us to integrate their e mail marketing platform seamlessly  with the tools and functionally Program required.  The platform is intuitive, the ability to make a complex process easy and the team at Experiture is always there to share creative ideas, engage us and our clients to deliver the best possible solutions.

They are an important part of our business as a Strategic Alliance and all of us at The GPS Group are proud to work with their amazing team and highly recommend them!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Experiture uniquely positions itself within this evolving eco-system.  Experiture has the sophisticated marketing capabilities and horse power that Marketo/HubSpot offers, which a marketing manager expects, but it also has an intuitive user interface that is simple enough for a salesperson to use to generate targeted, more limited and individualized campaigns.

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Very little at this time.  We are new adopters and very happy with the experience to date.

Recommendations to others considering Experiture Marketing Platform:
Have your entire user group look at the demo.

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Easy to design and deploy email campaigns and landing page design.

all_reviews.review_title: Experiture is a great tool for our company
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Experiture provides us with everything we ask for. They are always looking to help us get our campaigns live and offer excellent support. Their team will answer any questions we have, even if it is not regarding the Experiture Platform. They are a great source of knowledge and skills that can benefit almost any company.

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
There is not a lot that we dislike about Experiture.

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Experiture Marketing Platform is used by our marketing department. We use The Platform to send out targeted email blasts and direct mail that include Personalized URLS. The Experiture Marketing Platform also helps us capture and segment data from our Ecommerce platform to target the right audience. The team at Experiture addressed problems in our business by helping us gain access to data on our website that we could not access before.

all_reviews.review_title: 7-Step Multichannel Marketing made easy with Experiture!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Experiture Marketing Platform?
We created a fully customized 7-step Custom Acquisition Program and Experiture was there side-by-side with us to integrate their e mail marketing platform seamlessly  with the tools and functionally Program required.  The platform is intuitive, the ability to make a complex process easy and the team at Experiture is always there to share creative ideas, engage us and our clients to deliver the best possible solutions.

They are an important part of our business as a Strategic Alliance and all of us at The GPS Group are proud to work with their amazing team and highly recommend them!

What do you dislike about Experiture Marketing Platform?
Our biggest challenge was not fully understanding the complexity of "effective" multichannel marketing.  Understand the effectiveness of our Proprietary 7-Step Customer Acquisition Program was easy, knowing how to communicate that with any company that offers e mail marketing was our challenge.  After several meetings, we found the process to be overwhelming, complicated (of course we made it complicated) and realized we had a lot of work to do on our end.

Over time, we began to understand the Experiture Platform and got a clear understanding of how we needed to take advantage of their platform and how powerful their Platform could be in helping us achieve the effectiveness and results we were expecting.

Bottom line, any e mail marketing platform is complex and challenging for most people to fully understand and appreciate, but more importantly, finding the people behind the platform is, I believe, the most important factor when reviewing and making a decision on automated e mail marketing programs.

Recommendations to others considering Experiture Marketing Platform:
If you are considering a firm for your e mail marketing and going thru evaluating a company's platform, I would suggest the people behind the platform for their knowledge and experience.  If you have a complex multichannel marketing program, finding people who work with you to achieve your objectives is critical...

In our opinion, The Experiture Team is our Partner and people you should consider for your next campaign!

What problems is Experiture Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We had a client that was in multiple vertical markets, needed to get deeper penetration.  The challenge was they needed to reach high-level decision makers responsible for huge budgets.  Reaching these folks was our challenge.  Creating a customized 7-step customer acquisition, utilizing the Experiture Platform allowed us to reach these decision-makers in a way whereby they wanted to talk to our client.  The result, 350 select prospect names, 42 face-to-face meetings and written proposals ranging from $21,000 - $390,000...   Needless to say, our client was thrilled!
